content: <style=PlayerName>{玩家昵称}</style>! {A歪头}A mysterious voice led me to discover this <style=Highlight>Luca Fruit: Oasis Mirage</style>.

content: This was what I saw during my first journey across the desert planet. The oasis represents "hope," and I want to share this hope with you. I'm so glad that we live on the same planet!
info: NPC成长等级-6级演出-1013萨飞里_萨飞里
